name: Dolphin's Lovely Apartment No. 10080
address: 36 Nguy n Ho ng, My Dinh National Stadium, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Mai Dich, this air-conditioned apartment features a balcony with city views. The unit is 8 km from Hanoi. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The unit is equipped with a kitchenette. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available. Other facilities at Dolphin's Lovely Apartment No. 10080 include an outdoor pool.

Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km from the property.
